sentences.sentence: I think many times, I regard you as no longer friend, we should leave the friend concerns, because we had been amative relations!
sentences.translation: 我思前想后，我不再把你当作朋友，我们应该告别朋友 关系，因为我们已经是 恋爱 关系了！

sentences.sentence: The main exhibition of amative mentality of undergraduate are affectional need, simulate mentality and the change of value concept.
sentences.translation: 健康的恋爱心理和恋爱道德要求是当代大学生恋爱幸福与成功的基础。
